name: feature-navigator
description: Provides Go-to-Definition for feature file case numbers found in code.

featureNavigator.searchPattern.description: Glob pattern to find feature files. Use ${caseNumber} as a placeholder. Supports ** and *.

featureNavigator.tagPattern.description: Regex to detect case numbers in code. The first capture group must be the case number (e.g., '@C(\d+)').

featureNavigator.relativeRoot.description: Optional relative root folder from which to start the 'searchPattern' search.

featureNavigator.searchInContent.description: If true, also search the content of all .feature files for the tag (slower).
